title: QuerySome
name: QuerySome
description: This function calls a given closure/function with every element in a given query and returns true, if one of the closure calls returns true.

arguments.name: closure
arguments.description: function/closure that implements the following constructor [function(struct row [, number rowNumber, query query]):boolean].

arguments.name: maxThreads
arguments.description: maximum number of threads executed, ignored when argument "parallel" is set to false
